languages.text: {n}Внезапно ксенос мерзко хихикает — удивительно живая реакция для столь холодного существа.{/n} "Она оказалась неприятным сюрпризом для дракона Маражая. Бывшего дракона. Этот глупый юнец ждал от тебя меньшего, а {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}ты его так опозорил{mf||а}{/d}. А мне дал{mf||а} пищу для размышлений. Хороший образец".

traits.locale_text: "К слову, твое выступление на собрании архонтов, мон-кай, было достаточно громким, чтобы даже я его услышал. Мои медузы принесли поистине чудесные плоды, взращенные на панике и ярости глупого юнца. Пускай он больше не дракон, но я совершенно точно найду применение сывороткам его эмоций в своей работе. Косвенно — это твоя заслуга. Твоя ценность в моих глазах возрасла. Возьми, это повысит твои шансы на выживание".
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle, a surprisingly lively reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}humiliated him{/d}. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапно ксенос мерзко хихикает — удивительно живая реакция для столь холодного существа.{/n} "Она оказалась неприятным сюрпризом для дракона Маражая. Бывшего дракона. Этот глупый юнец ждал от тебя меньшего, а {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}ты его так опозорил{mf||а}{/d}. А мне дал{mf||а} пищу для размышлений. Хороший образец".

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle — an unexpectedly animated reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon. That foolish whelp expected less from you, and you humiliated him. And it gave me some food for thought. Good specimen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle — an unexpectedly animated reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon. That foolish whelp expected less from you, and you humiliated him. And it gave me some food for thought. Good specimen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle, an surprisingly heated reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you humiliated him. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle, an surprisingly heated reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you humiliated him. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}humiliated him{/d}. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle, a surprisingly lively reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}humiliated him{/d}. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Le xénos laisse soudain échapper un gloussement étonnamment haineux pour une créature habituellement si mesurée.{/n} « Ce qui s'est avéré une surprise assez déplaisante pour le dracon Marazhai. Enfin, l'ancien dracon. Ce misérable imbécile pensait avoir le dessus sur vous, mais vous l'avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}humilié{/d}. Cela m'a donné à réfléchir. Brave spécimen. »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle, a surprisingly lively reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}humiliated him{/d}. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos laisse soudain échapper un gloussement étonnamment haineux pour une créature habituellement si mesurée.{/n} « Ce qui s'est avéré une surprise assez déplaisante pour le dracon Marazhai. Enfin, l'ancien dracon. Ce misérable imbécile pensait avoir le dessus sur vous, mais vous l'avez humilié. Cela m'a donné à réfléchir. Brave spécimen. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}眼前的异形突然发出一阵充满怨毒意味的笑声。对于如此冷漠的生物而言，这样热烈的反应很令人吃惊。{/n}“这给玛拉斋裁决官带来了相当不愉快的意外，噢，应该说是‘前’裁决官。那个蠢货低估了你，而你{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}羞辱了他{/d}。这不禁让我想到了某些事情，真是不错的实验对象。”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle, a surprisingly lively reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}humiliated him{/d}. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的异形突然发出一阵充满怨毒意味的笑声。对于如此冷漠的生物而言，这样热烈的反应很令人吃惊。{/n}“这给玛拉斋裁决官带来了相当不愉快的意外，噢，应该说是‘前’裁决官。那个蠢货低估了你，而你羞辱了他。这不禁让我想到了某些事情，真是不错的实验对象。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos stößt plötzlich ein gehässiges Gackern aus, eine überraschend lebhafte Reaktion für eine so kalte Kreatur.{/n} "Was eine unangenehme Überraschung für den Dracon Marazhai war. Den ehemaligen Dracon, meine ich. Dieser törichte Welpe hat Euch unterschätzt, und Ihr habt ihn {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}blamiert{/d}. Das hat mich ins Grübeln gebracht. Ein gutes Versuchsstück."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle, a surprisingly lively reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}humiliated him{/d}. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos stößt plötzlich ein gehässiges Gackern aus, eine überraschend hitzige Reaktion für eine solch kalte Kreatur.{/n} "Was eine unangenehme Überraschung für den Dracon Marazhai war. Den ehemaligen Dracon, meine ich. Dieser törichte Wurm hat Euch unterschätzt, und Ihr habt ihn blamiert. Das hat mich ins Grübeln gebracht. Ein gutes Versuchsstück."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}De repente, el xenos suelta una maliciosa carcajada, una reacción demasiado exaltada para una criatura tan fría.{/n} «Lo que resultó en una desagradable sorpresa para el Dracón Marazhai. Quiero decir, el exdracón. Ese necio mocoso esperaba menos de ti y lo {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}has humillado{/d}, algo que me ha dado que pensar. Un buen espécimen, sí, sí».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle, a surprisingly lively reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}humiliated him{/d}. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, el xenos suelta una maliciosa carcajada, una reacción demasiado exaltada para una criatura tan fría.{/n} «Lo que resultó en una desagradable sorpresa para el dracón Marazhai. Quiero decir, el anterior dracón. Ese necio mocoso esperaba menos de ti y lo has humillado, algo que me ha dado que pensar. Un buen espécimen, sí, sí».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}異種族は珍しく、突然、唾を吐くようなキャッキャッという笑い声を上げた。{/n}「ドラコンのマラズハイにとって不愉快な驚きだったようだ。元ドラコンか。あの愚かな小僧は、お前に 期待などしていなかった。お前は彼に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}恥をかかせた{/d}のだ。おかげで考えさせられたよ。よくやった」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle, a surprisingly lively reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}humiliated him{/d}. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は珍しく、突然、唾を吐くようなキャッキャッという笑い声を上げた。{/n}「ドラコンのマラズハイにとって不愉快な驚きだったようだ。元ドラコンか。あの愚かな小僧は、お前に 期待などしていなかった。お前は彼に{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}恥をかかせた{/d}のだ。おかげで考えさせられたよ。よくやった」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Zeno aniden kindar bir şekilde gülümseyerek böylesi soğukkanlı bir yaratık için fazlasıyla sıcakkanlı bir tepki veriyor.{/n} "Drakon... Daha doğrusu eski Drakon Marazhai için nahoş bir sürpriz oldu. O eniğin senden pek bir beklentisi yoktu, sense onu {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}küçük düşürdün{/d}. Bu durum bana üzerine düşünülecek, iyi bir numune verdi."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos suddenly lets out a spiteful cackle, a surprisingly lively reaction for such a cold creature.{/n} "Which made for an unpleasant surprise for Dracon Marazhai. Former Dracon, that is. That foolish whelp expected less of you, and you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}humiliated him{/d}. It gave me something to think about. A good specimen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Zeno aniden kindar bir şekilde gülümsüyor. Böylesi soğuk bir yaratık için şaşırtıcı derecede canlı bir tepki.{/n} "Drakon Marazhai için nahoş bir sürpriz oldu. Eski Drakon daha doğrusu. O sersem eniğin senden pek bir beklentisi yoktu ve sen onu {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_TrialFailed}küçük düşürdün{/d}. Bana üzerine düşünülecek bir şeyler verdi. İyi bir numune."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
